column3: â€œThis strain was REALLY fun to smoke, a couple of my friends and I took a walk around a wooded area ripping three of four bowls. Was one of the best highs I've ever had.â€

â€œGot an ounce of this stuff in Chicago.  Fire Haze is best for adventures in the sun.  It doesn't make me as hungry as other strains do but if I start eating it is very hard to stop.  I always get really dry eyes and mouth.  Sometimes fire haze makes me and my friends paranoid but this stuff is worth it...  One of my favorite sativa strains that has made it to chicago.â€

â€œVery good. Kept me focused on anything I put my mind to. Mostly a head high and a bit on the shoulders, as expected from a sativa. Overall, a good day-time strain when you want to relax and go through life.â€
â€œReally fun to smoke with friends. Made us want to walk everywhere. The come down was decent though I was extreamly tired. One of my favourites.â€
â€œThis strain works wonders on my depression. It helps get me out of the house and active. I love it.â€
â€œIt is EXTREMELY pleasing... and amazing for social events.. Great for public functionsâ€
â€œPretty nice strain. Took a couple bong snaps for me to feel it. Made me feel dizzy and silly, and for sure a nice strain to try when you're looking to chill out.â€
â€œThis is the best shitâ€
â€œGreat sativa, not advised for those prone to paranoia, definitely a get-up-and go strain.â€
â€œjust bought this 8th off my boy bout to buss out these 8-9 bags and double profitâ€
â€œReally fun to smoke with friends. Made us want to walk everywhere. The come down was decent though I was extreamly tired. One of my favourites.â€
â€œPretty nice strain. Took a couple bong snaps for me to feel it. Made me feel dizzy and silly, and for sure a nice strain to try when you're looking to chill out.â€

â€œI broke into this bud and immediately fell in love, if it wasn't snowing outside it would be in here because these crystals are off the hook. Great high, hits you fast, great get up and go strain.â€

â€œGood smoke after my nap today- got me back up and moving again. I liked the head based high- I have a tendency to clench my jaw and carry tension in my neck and this helped me stay chill for sure w/o being tired again. Didn't hit me ğŸ’¥ like other people describe but I certainly got a boost after smoking it- probably a good one for a dinner party or social outing type gig. Got dry mouth almost right away so keep the H...â€
â€œIt was weird it did not make me high at first but 3 hours later i felt so relaxed and happyâ€
â€œA great daytime strain. It's a head high type of weed. Very good for people who want to stay awake and enjoy a nice mellow high.â€

â€œthis is probally my favorite sativa strain. hits you hard and fast but the only issue is its not around enough. great for adventures or just trying to chill. euphoric is the best word I could think ofâ€

â€œThis stuff hits you hard and fast. it's a great high for listening to music and chilling. You get pretty dry mouth and eyes but it's me and my brothers favorite strain. The only problem with it is we can't find it enough!â€

â€œdecent head high not so much a body high or pain relief that I was told from the dispensary (a first they're usually on point). put me in an awesome mood, great strain for video games or hanging out with buddies, looking forward to my camping trip with this one. very strong smelling even in an air tight containerâ€

â€œThis weed when looked at has many red hairs covering it making it look almost not green but just a reddish orange. When broken up it is very dense and dark green on inside with little crystals, just sticky. When inhaled, is very earthy flavor and aftertaste. Great if you love haze. 4/5â€
â€œQuite an intense high will have you on your arse in large amounts. Makes you feel relaxed and will leave you pretty monged out. The high is quite heavy but I think its pretty good bud.â€

â€œA very nice high from this strain. A nice head high with a great body high! I smoked some of this before I laid down to watch Netflix, and man it felt great. If your looking for something to really put you to sleep this isn't it.â€
â€œWent in the boxing ring with this in my system smh lets just say its a disadvantage for the other guy.â€
